div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: ALL DAY AND HALF DAY KINDERGARTEN REGISTRATION DATES

div.p: Kindergarten Registration dates have been set for the Saugus Public Schools 2020-2021 school year. Registration will be held at the Roby Building, 23 Main Street, Saugus, on the following dates: Wednesday, March 11, 2020 and Thursday, March 12, 2020 between the hours of 9:30am to 2:00pm. Kindergarten options will be 1/2 days (a.m. (8:40 - 11:10) or p.m. (12:10 - 2:40) sessions) as well as full day. Children must be 5 years old by August 31, 2020.
Please bring the following documentation to registration: Birth Certificate, Proof of Residency, Immunization Records, and a Parent Photo ID. A $200 deposit is required for full day registrations.

div.a: New Student Registration - Bus Pass Applications

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Saugus Public School Department is current looking to employ Bus Monitors.
● Assists the bus driver with the safety, movement, management and care of the children while
boarding the school bus, leaving the bus or being transported.
● Seats self in an area on the bus to ensure observation of all passengers at all times and make
sure they are following school bus safety rules.
● Assists the school bus driver in reporting infractions of school bus safety to building principal.
● Maintains a high standard of student conduct and safety at all times.
● Ensures that a child takes his/her belongings with him/her when departing the bus Middle School/High School Bus hours approximately 6:30 am to 7:30 am and 1:30 pm to 2:30 pm.
Pay is $13.06 per hour per the SEAA contract.
If interested please contact Ms. Linda Belmonte at 781-231-5000 ext.120
